name: PHVS_InfectionsDuringPregnancyFetalDeath_NCHS
title: Infections During Pregnancy Fetal Death (NCHS)
description: The value set contains the list of selected infections that the mother had or was treated for during the course of this pregnancy for fetal death, as required by the National US Standards. Note: Genital herpes simplex (SNOMED code 33839006) is only a Michigan state-specific requirement.

concept.display: None of the specified items in this value set (including concept codes: 15628003,  76272004, 105629000, 4241002, 426933007, 28944009, 186748004, 187192000, 33839006) were present and/or treated during this pregnancy
